collaboration_infrastructure.description: Commands that enable product development and maintain system architecture

architect.summary: Technical planning & implementation framework with research-driven methodology
architect.collaboration: Reads code-owner health metrics, business-analyst requirements

code-owner.summary: Comprehensive codebase health analysis and strategic technical reviews
code-owner.collaboration: Provides technical health data to architect and product-owner

product_owner.summary: Transform technical findings into prioritized product decisions
product_owner.collaboration: Consumes architect plans and code-owner assessments

business_analyst.summary: Requirements gathering, process optimization, and stakeholder alignment
business_analyst.collaboration: Provides requirements to architect and product-owner

command.collaboration: Manages creation, optimization, alignment, analysis, and maintenance

documentation_owner.summary: Documentation lifecycle & quality management with institutional standards
documentation_owner.collaboration: Ensures documentation quality across all commands and maintains consistency

core_product.description: User-facing AI functionality for content generation and analysis
core_product.conflict_prevention: Cannot create documentation that conflicts with infrastructure commands

twitter_post.summary: Expert social media content optimization for X/Twitter engagement
twitter_post.collaboration: Uses team workspace data for context-aware content

twitter_post_strategy.summary: Trading strategy analysis and social media post generation
twitter_post_strategy.collaboration: Reads trading analysis data from outputs/exports/markdown/

twitter_fundamental_analysis.summary: Fundamental analysis social media content generation
twitter_fundamental_analysis.collaboration: Uses fundamental analysis outputs for social content

fundamental_analysis_full.summary: Complete DASV workflow for institutional-quality fundamental analysis
fundamental_analysis_full.collaboration: Orchestrates four specialized microservices through DASV framework

content_publisher.collaboration: Publishes content generated by other commands

content_evaluator.collaboration: Evaluates content generated by other commands

social_media_strategist.summary: Social media strategy development and optimization
social_media_strategist.collaboration: Provides strategic guidance for social content commands

trade_history.collaboration: Provides historical context for trading strategies

trade_history_images.collaboration: Creates visual content for trading analysis

twitter_trade_history.collaboration: Combines trade history with social media optimization

microservices.description: Atomic microservice implementations following DASV framework

fundamental_analyst_discover.summary: Discovery phase implementation for fundamental analysis

fundamental_analyst_analyze.summary: Analysis phase implementation for fundamental analysis
fundamental_analyst_analyze.collaboration: Second phase of DASV workflow, uses discover outputs

fundamental_analyst_synthesize.summary: Synthesis phase implementation for fundamental analysis
fundamental_analyst_synthesize.collaboration: Third phase of DASV workflow, uses analyze outputs

fundamental_analyst_validate.summary: Validation phase implementation for fundamental analysis
fundamental_analyst_validate.collaboration: Final phase of DASV workflow, validates all outputs

utilities.note: Only utilities can skip pre-execution validation

commit_push.summary: Automated git workflow (stage all changes, generate commit message, push to remote)
commit_push.collaboration: Can be triggered after architect implementation phases

sub_agents.description: Specialized sub-agents for systematic data processing within DASV framework

researcher.summary: Systematic data discovery and collection for *_discovery.json file creation
researcher.collaboration: Provides discovery data to analyst sub-agent for processing

analyst.summary: Systematic analysis and processing of discovery data for *_analysis.json file creation
analyst.collaboration: Processes discovery data from researcher, prepares for synthesis phase

twitter_writer.summary: Expert Twitter/X content creation and social media optimization
twitter_writer.collaboration: Transforms analysis outputs into engaging social media content

validation.pre_execution_enforcement: All commands except utilities require pre-execution validation
